sources.title: Escape From Terror: The Teresa Stamper Story | FULL MOVIE | True Crime Story
sources.description:
A young waitress marries a wealthy Oklahoma oilman and is plunged into the deadly world of abuse. When she leaves him, he stalks her, kidnaps her and holds her hostage.

#crime #truecrime #truestory #fullmovie #tvmovie #classicmovies #waitress #stalker #scarystories #dark

metadata.Plot: A couple who have escaped from the Baltics to Copenhagen are pursued by a KGB officer.
metadata.Writer: James Barnett, John Hueners, Egon C. Nielsen
metadata.Actors: Jackie Coogan, Mona Knox, Mike Stokey
